Name: Operation Silver Shield
Details: The take-over of Terra in 2876 by Jerome Blake and the nascent ComStar, who had been appointed by the Council Lords as Ministry of Communications and responsible for the Hyper Pulse Generator network. After the Star League was dissolved, Blake was able to convince some of the SLDF troops who chose not to join General Kerensky' exodus to join his organization and take control of Terra and all the HPG stations, while declaring ComStar's neutrality while responsible for the interstellar message network.
